meanings.definition: Following one another in uninterrupted order.
meanings.sent1: The successively numbered boxes were neatly stacked on top of each other.
meanings.sent2: The students lined up successively according to their heights.
meanings.sent3: The successively colored balloons created a beautiful pattern in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The successively growing plants resembled a staircase to the sky.
meanings.sent5: The successively increasing waves crashed against the shore with rhythmic precision.

meanings.definition: In a successive manner or sequence.
meanings.sent1: She completed the levels successively, without skipping any.
meanings.sent2: The numbers on the clock changed successively as time passed.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled rabbits out of his hat successively, to the audience's amazement.
meanings.sent4: The runner passed each mile marker successively, pushing towards the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The keys on the piano were pressed successively, creating a melodious tune.
